# Project Information

## iOS Spotify Music App

A complete iOS music player application built with Swift and SwiftUI.

### Project Details
- **Name**: Spotify Music App
- **Platform**: iOS 15.0+
- **Framework**: SwiftUI
- **Language**: Swift 5.5+

### Key Features Implemented
✅ Music browsing and search
✅ Offline download support
✅ YouTube video browser
✅ Spotify-inspired dark theme with green accents
✅ Audio playback
✅ Sort and filter functionality
✅ Beautiful card-based UI

### Directory Structure
```
SpotifyMusicApp/
├── Models/              (Data models and colors)
├── Services/            (Business logic)
├── Views/               (UI components)
├── Utils/               (Constants and helpers)
└── SpotifyMusicApp.swift (App entry)
```

### Getting Started in Xcode
1. Create a new iOS App project in Xcode
2. Copy all Swift files to your project
3. Build and run on simulator or device

### Customization Tips
- Colors are defined in `AppColors.swift`
- Mock data is in `MusicService.swift` and `YouTubeService.swift`
- Replace with real APIs as needed
